script.name: plugin.piracy.lootwreck.generate
script.description: Piracy: Loot Wreck: Generate correct components for wrecks

line.comment: * GENERATE RANDOM WRECK DATA by MISTER BEAR v1.0
* -- UTIL SCRIPT FOR: LOOT WRECK by MISTER BEAR
* NOTE: Create the illusion of a wrecked M1, M2 or TL by assigning
* appropriate components based upon the race of the vessel.
* ------------------ DEFINE POSSIBLE SHIPS and COMPONENTS ------------------
* DEFINE SHIPS
* DEFINE EQUIPMENT
* DEFINE RARE EQUIPMENT and SHIELDS
* DEFINE WEAPONS
* SPECIAL CASES
* Rare Weapons = Plasma Beam Cannon, Tri-Beam Cannon, Phased Array Laser Cannon, Fusion Beam Cannon
* Terran / Xenon = Electro-Magnetic Plasma Cannon, Matter/Anti-Matter Launcher, Starburst Shockwave Cannon, Point Singularity Projector, null
* Khaak = Alpha Kyon Emitter, Beta Kyon Emitter, Gamma Kyon Emitter, null, null
* ------------------ ASSEMBLE THEM INTO A BELIEVABLE WRECK ------------------
* RANDOMLY CHOOSE A SHIP
* SET WRECK NAME AND CONDITION %
* ADD UP TO FOUR RANDOM EQUIPMENT COMPONENTS
* -- DO NOT ADD THE SAME COMPONENT TWICE
* ADD COMPONENT
* TODO: HANDLE THE TERRAN / XENON CASE. ESPECIALLY TERRANS WHO
* TODO: ONLY USE THEIR TECH, RATHER THAN XENON WHO ALSO USE THEIR TECH.
* TODO: PERHAPS THE CAMO / CARGO SHIELD SHOULD ONLY BE FOR THE PIRATES?
* TODO: THIS MAKES IT EASIER TO IMPLMENT AS ALL SPECIAL CASES ARE BUILT
* TODO: UPON CHECKING A SPECIFIC SHIP INDEX..
* ADD UP TO SIX RANDOM WEAPON COMPONENTS
* DEBUG
* $iCount = 1
* $iCount = 6
* ADD COMPONENT
* ADD A RANDOM SHIELD COMPONENT
* (10% CHANCE) ADD RANDOM PIECE OF RARE EQUIPMENT
* MATCH SHIP INDEX TO RACE - Object classes don't have owner races, have to set it manually!
* PARAM: $i - index (into 'aShips' array) of chosen ship
* ADD COMPONENT TO WRECK - Adds a component with a random damage % and recovery % to the wreck
* PARAM: oWare -- ware to be added
* SET COMPONENT
* SET RANDOM DAMAGE AND RECOVERY PERCENTAGES

sval.val: Piracy: Loot Wreck: Generate correct components for wrecks
%s %s
Wreck array to populate
GENERATE RANDOM WRECK DATA by MISTER BEAR v1.0
-- UTIL SCRIPT FOR: LOOT WRECK by MISTER BEAR
NOTE: Create the illusion of a wrecked M1, M2 or TL by assigning
appropriate components based upon the race of the vessel.
------------------ DEFINE POSSIBLE SHIPS and COMPONENTS ------------------
DEFINE SHIPS
DEFINE EQUIPMENT
DEFINE RARE EQUIPMENT and SHIELDS
DEFINE WEAPONS
SPECIAL CASES
Rare Weapons = {Plasma Beam Cannon}, {Tri-Beam Cannon}, {Phased Array Laser Cannon}, {Fusion Beam Cannon}
Terran / Xenon = {Electro-Magnetic Plasma Cannon}, {Matter/Anti-Matter Launcher}, {Starburst Shockwave Cannon}, {Point Singularity Projector}, null
Khaak = {Alpha Kyon Emitter}, {Beta Kyon Emitter}, {Gamma Kyon Emitter}, null, null
------------------ ASSEMBLE THEM INTO A BELIEVABLE WRECK ------------------
RANDOMLY CHOOSE A SHIP
SET WRECK NAME AND CONDITION %
ADD UP TO FOUR RANDOM EQUIPMENT COMPONENTS
-- DO NOT ADD THE SAME COMPONENT TWICE
ADD COMPONENT
TODO: HANDLE THE TERRAN / XENON CASE. ESPECIALLY TERRANS WHO
TODO: ONLY USE THEIR TECH, RATHER THAN XENON WHO ALSO USE THEIR TECH.
TODO: PERHAPS THE CAMO / CARGO SHIELD SHOULD ONLY BE FOR THE PIRATES?
TODO: THIS MAKES IT EASIER TO IMPLMENT AS ALL SPECIAL CASES ARE BUILT
TODO: UPON CHECKING A SPECIFIC SHIP INDEX..
ADD UP TO SIX RANDOM WEAPON COMPONENTS
ADD COMPONENT
ADD A RANDOM SHIELD COMPONENT
(10% CHANCE) ADD RANDOM PIECE OF RARE EQUIPMENT
MATCH SHIP INDEX TO RACE - Object classes don't have owner races, have to set it manually!
PARAM: $i - index (into 'aShips' array) of chosen ship
ADD COMPONENT TO WRECK - Adds a component with a random damage % and recovery % to the wreck
PARAM: oWare -- ware to be added
SET COMPONENT
SET RANDOM DAMAGE AND RECOVERY PERCENTAGES
